      • addStream

        public void addStream(java.io.InputStream instream,
             java.lang.String baseURI,
             org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat format,
             org.openrdf.model.Resource context)
               throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                      org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Imports RDF data from a stream.
        Parameters:
        instream - The input stream of RDF data.
        baseURI - The base URI to resolve any relative URIs that are in the data against.
        format - The RDF format of the string (used to select parser).
        context - The context of the data.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
        java.io.IOException

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.lang.String filepath,
           java.lang.String baseURI,
           org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat format,
           org.openrdf.model.Resource context)
             throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                    org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Imports RDF data from a file.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The (absolute) filepath of file (c:/path/file) with RDF data.
        baseURI - The base URI to resolve any relative URIs that are in the data against.
        format - The RDF format of the string (used to select parser).
        context - The context of the data.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
        java.io.IOException

      • addURI

        public void addURI(java.lang.String urlstring,
          org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat format,
          org.openrdf.model.Resource context)
            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                   org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Imports data from URI source. Request is made with proper HTTP ACCEPT header. and will follow redirects for proper LOD source negotiation.
        Parameters:
        urlstring - The (absolute) URI of the data source.
        format - The RDF format to request/parse from data source.
        context - The context of the data.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
        java.io.IOException

      • tuplePattern

        public java.util.List tuplePattern(org.openrdf.model.URI s,
                          org.openrdf.model.URI p,
                          org.openrdf.model.Value o)
                            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Tuple pattern query - find all statements with the pattern, where null is a wildcard.
        Parameters:
        s - The subject of the triple (null for wildcard).
        p - The predicate of the triple (null for wildcard).
        o - The object of the triple (null for wildcard).
        Returns:
        A serialized graph of results.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

                                     org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat format)

                                              org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException,
                                              org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                              org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException,
                                              org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandlerException
        Executes a CONSTRUCT/DESCRIBE SPARQL query against the graph.
        Parameters:
        qs - The CONSTRUCT or DESCRIBE SPARQL query.
        format - The serialization format for the returned graph.
        Returns:
        A serialized graph of results.

      • runSPARQL2List

        public java.util.List runSPARQL2List(java.lang.String qs)
                              throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                     org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                     org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Executes a SELECT SPARQL query against the graph.
        Parameters:
        qs - The SELECT SPARQL query.
        Returns:
        A list of solutions, each containing a hashmap of bindings.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException

                                                    org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Executes a SELECT SPARQL query against the graph.
        Parameters:
        qs - The SELECT SPARQL query.
        Returns:
        A SPARQLXML result of solutions, in PipedInputStream object.

        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

        predicate - The predicate of the triple.
        object - The object of the triple.
        context - The context of the triple to be removed.

        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
